author: ltheussl
msg: Correct header of dtd identifier for xdoc validation. Thanks to Jeff Jensen.

author: danj
msg: A number of components (persistence layer is the latest one) now have the ability to accept init params, so I factored
out this interface and reuse it across them.

author: danj
msg: Changed the deployment descriptor parser with one addition and one removal:
1. Added the persistence spec per MUSE-25 - allows users to state which "location" (some URI) shall hold the persisted
router table and which Java class shall be loaded to perform this task.
2. Removed instances-at-startup attribute parsing because of its removal from the schema - see SVN rev. 424800

author: ltheussl
msg: Remove illegal <plugins> element. Thanks to Jeff Jensen.
